list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a material prepared in ancient Egypt from the pithy stem of a water plant, used in sheets throughout the ancient Mediterranean world for writing or painting on and also for making rope, sandals, and boats.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the text was preserved, probably on papyrus
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Văn bản được bảo tồn, có thể là trên giấy cói

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the tall aquatic sedge from which papyrus is obtained, native to central Africa and the Nile valley.
